tr.td:
If the gen_serverprocess is
registered through an alternative
process registry

div.div: Can be called without Timeout as gen_server:call/2.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 138px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Timeout specifies how many milliseconds to wait for a reply, or the atom infinity to wait indefinitely

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 215px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal;
display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 128px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: From is a tuple {Pid, Tag}, where Pid is the pid of the client and Tag is a unique tag

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 117px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: State is the internal state of the gen_server process

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 106px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.span: continues executing with the possibly updated internal state

td.div: Any reply to From must be specified
Any reply to From must be specified

div.div: waiting for the next message to arrive

tr.td:
Reply is given back to From as the
return value of gen_server:call/2,3.The gen_server process then calls
Module:terminate(Reason, NewState)
and terminates

td.div: Any reply to From must be specified

The gen_server process then calls
Module:terminate(Reason, NewState)
and terminates

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 177px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal;
